summary: Rich party girl sets her eyes on a young attorney.
cast: Alice White|Paul Page|Myrna Loy|Robert Agnew|Douglas Gilmore|George Irving|Sayre Dearing|Geraldine Dvorak|Jay Eaton|Adolph Faylauer|Dick Gordon|Thelma Hill|Lloyd Ingraham|Jane Keckley|Fred Kelsey|Marian Marsh
director: Director: Edward F. Cline (as Edward Cline)
title: The Naughty Flirt
